Entry: Twirling rapidly to build up energy, POKENAME defend themselves with the rings that surround their bodies. If they ever need to get out of trouble, they rapidly rotate their rings to propel themselves upwards with the magnetic force.
Author: Wildheartrazorfangs

Entry: An ancient automaton, POKENAME is curiously made with modern mechanical parts. Allegedly, an army of them could be strong enough to conquer the world.
Author: Blazerxz

Entry: The colored orbs indicate POKENAME's disposition, glowing red when it becomes aggressive. In combat, fire bursts from every one of its vents, coating its body and wings in roiling flames.
Author: sk372

Entry: The cage of gears around POKENAME help to control its wild and ancient magic. Each gear carries a unique enchantment.
Author: hampterbychoice

Entry: Legends state that if POKENAME ever stops spinning its gears, any onlookers will be cursed. The Ninetales only moves its lower body to stay on the gears. It doesn't appear to actually be organic: only a faint whirring can be heard inside of it.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: POKENAME has a voracious appetite for metal, attacking factory machinery in a feeding frenzy. It is considered a pest because of the damage it causes in large swarms.
Author: Daemonkill22

Entry: Its energy core and projectile-emitting teeth allow POKENAME to ground and catch prey flying above it.
Author: abstrusepaladin

Entry: POKENAME hides in scrapyards, camouflaging among rusted gears. When disturbed, it releases a magnetic pulse that locks nearby objects in place before clamping down on them with its heavy metal jaws, capturing anything in its path.
Author: jaminmcready

Entry: POKENAME scampers about searching for precious gems that it can make into valuable decorative gears. What purpose this behaviour serves is unknown.
Author: Phantom640

Entry: It has learned to twirl the ring around its waist by gyrating its lower body. The sounds of clinking metal as it dances produces a satisfying rhythm.
Author: seaslux

Entry: POKENAME is most often seen in scrapyards, consuming any bits of metal it comes across. With its composition being a seemingly-random assortment of junk parts, scientists are still studying how it functions at all.
Author: sk372

Entry: Some conspiracy theorists believe that POKENAME is a secret government project designed to attack enemy ships from below.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: The time on its dial never matches the actual time. Folk tales believe that POKENAME actually shows the date of death of the person who sees it.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: Archaeologists found a specimen of POKENAME while investigating an ancient site. It is uncertain when, or even if, POKENAME will run out of fuel.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: Archaeologists found a specimen of POKENAME while investigating an ancient site. It is uncertain when, or even if, POKENAME will run out of fuel.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME was first found after an expedition into an abandoned mine. Its engine is powered by a mysterious dark matter.
Author: anarchaz

Entry: Due to its large size, POKENAME requires an extremely large amount of coal to be able to move. The many spinning gears inside of POKENAME's body allow it to generate electricity, which it uses to attack its opponents.
Author: darkweavile428

Entry: With its powerful core and self-defense capabilities from its ring, POKENAME mines more minerals than it needs and easily makes its owner a profit.
Author: abstrusepaladin

Entry: When maintained, this trio can perform extremely profitable mining operations. When neglected, they've been known to cause disastrous cave-ins.
Author: abstrusepaladin

Entry: Its whiskers can detect the presence of valuable items from far away. It regularly polishes its steel body to maintain its shine.
Author: lynkinator

Entry: POKENAME are often used in large industrial forges to transport hot metal, as they do not mind high heat and can trudge through molten material.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME eats coal to fuel the furnace in its body. It ejects the incredibly hot flames from the combustion process through various openings.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME rotates continuously, using self-generated magnetism to accelerate in such a way that it sparks.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME can generate an incredible amount of energy, but it also emits powerful magnetic waves that disable most electrical devices in the vicinity.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: By rotating its heads, POKENAME can constantly generate energy and heat, which it can store in its outer ring. It can also use this to release it.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME's body rotates continuously, causing its individual heads to change position regularly. The one at the top is in temporary command.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME are often found in burnt factories, as the Klinklang melts and fuses with the Muk. This is a fusion that was found even before DNA Splicers.
Author: .ssunday.

Entry: Before changing its appearance through illusions, POKENAME surrounds itself with smoke, making those who see it think it fled.
Author: pinkyoshi2350

Entry: Wild POKENAME are highly dangerous because of their ability to create an illusion as a distraction while it strikes from behind.
Author: Prof.Whitebeam

Entry: Its power over illusions and ability to shapeshift its incredibly malleable body means that it can take on nearly any appearance it desires, as long as it has the body mass for it. If it is suddenly surprised, it will revert to its original form.
Author: El Fail

Entry: Whenever it encounters predators, POKENAME creates illusionary flames in an attempt to scare them away. While it's normally wary of Trainers, those it trusts find its fur to be incredibly soft.
Author: Tmotime

Entry: Their flames allow POKENAME to ensnare their opponents in a mirage formed by the heat haze. Once trapped by the illusion, there is no escape.
Author: JordanX27

Entry: A Pokémon often associated with vast wisdom and cunning. Its mastery over illusions allows it to appear in many places at once, deceiving both prey and those who hunt it. Even more frighteningly, its illusions can make forests appear endless.
Author: El Fail

Entry: It projects holograms in the deep sea to lure prey and scare predators. When it feels lonely, POKENAME uses that power to create imaginary friends.
Author: epping_forest

Entry: By mimicking the cries of other bird Pokémon, POKENAME deceives parents and steals eggs from their nests while they're away.
Author: .izik

Entry: This incredibly shy Pokémon can conjure illusions to mislead potential enemies or cover its escape. Due to its large size, cuddly appearance, and lack of aggression, POKENAME are prized highly as pets for young children.
Author: El Fail

Entry: POKENAME can draw any scene as if it were real in order to confound its prey. For whatever reason, though, this strategy never seems to actually work.
Author: squawkabairdy

Entry: Despite ominous tales, POKENAME is gentle toward lost toddlers. It imitates their parents to guide wandering children safely back to towns.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME are as fast as they are cunning. They will quietly hide in the shadows before swiftly shocking their target with a deep-red lightning bolt.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME imitates power plant workers with eerie precision. When left alone, it siphons electricity from machines to fuel itself.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME swoops from tree to tree, casting illusions from the shadows. These perplexing phantasms range from malicious to deadly.
Author: .realthree

Entry: This Pokémon is also known as the "Lady of Illusions". It is said that it uses its illusions to look like a human and to live in big cities.
Author: Comrade Miku

Entry: This noble Pokémon can create the most elaborate illusions to lure humans away from its home. It can even make illusory creatures tangible if it sacrifices some of its life force.
Author: cheroace

Entry: Cloaked in shadows and powered by aura, POKENAME confounds foes with illusions while striking with steel claws. Its power surges with each deception.
Author: Sheogorath

Entry: POKENAME uses its illusions to hide itself from Trainers and Pokémon it considers to be weak. It will only reveal itself to worthy opponents in order to challenge them to a fight.
Author: Hello_I_Exist

Entry: To protect their lair, POKENAME work together to trick and swiftly attack at those they deem to be a threat. It has speed and agility like no other Pokémon.
Author: DaHappycute

Entry: Its six ears are said to hear any secret within a thousand miles radius. POKENAME can perfectly impersonate any creature it wants for its own benefit.
Author: milchik

Entry: POKENAME traps multiple victims in illusions at once, storing them for later, when it'll be hungry for their life force.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: A master of both battle and trickery, POKENAME tend to shy away from combat, instead creating electrical mirages to hide their children from danger. They love to create illusionary thunderstorms to drive away competitors and curious people.
Author: CpnQuacken

Entry: The ultimate nocturnal hunter, POKENAME causes blackouts to terrify its prey. Its X-ray vision and illusion manipulation make it a fearsome foe whose eyes cannot be blinded.
Author: merclipse

Entry: POKENAME has fine control over water, using it to refract and reflect light through mists to create visual illusions. These illusions are usually used in an effort to entertain and amuse sailors and other Pokémon.
Author: Katie

Entry: If you watch TV near POKENAME, it will get incredibly upset. You can sometimes hear radio broadcasts emanating from it.
Author: JokersWild

Entry: If you watch TV near POKENAME, it will get incredibly upset. You can sometimes hear radio broadcasts emanating from it.
Author: JokersWild

Entry: POKENAME lurks in abandoned chateaus, typically posing as a chandelier. It imitates noble figures waving silently from windows to passing travelers.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME are both incredibly territorial and incredibly strong. Rangers keep a close eye on their habitat to ensure they don't roam too close to where people live.
Author: bee4082

Entry: When hunting, it will create illusions of itself and surround the prey. Once it breaks the prey's spirit, it spits flames at them.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME weaves through the shadows, its nine ethereal tails flickering like wisps of smoke. A master of deception, it creates illusions that confuse foes, striking with swift, fiery attacks.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: A pure soul corrupted by fusion, POKENAME dreams of a world destroyed by a catastrophe. Many people theorize that its dream is a prophecy.
Author: 8xviktor

Entry: Appearing prominently in various myths and legends, POKENAME are known as a boon or a bane depending on the era. Due to their longevity and high intelligence, some still wear and maintain the adornments they were given long ago.
Author: El Fail

Entry: Appearing prominently in various myths and legends, POKENAME are known as a boon or a bane depending on the era. Due to their longevity and high intelligence, some still wear and maintain the adornments they were given long ago.
Author: El Fail

Entry: It is known to come up with bizarre ideas on how to get more Genius Mochi from its Trainer. Its cunning tricks are seen in Pokémon battles too, especially if it has time to set up a Nasty Plot.
Author: quackquackattack

Entry: POKENAME disguises itself as a child and plays in parks. If discovered, it releases Sleep Powder and vanishes before anyone can react.
Author: .izik

Entry: In foggy marshes, POKENAME takes the form of lost children. It waits for rescuers to draw near before attacking with a Hex.
Author: .izik

Entry: Underwater, POKENAME mimics scuba divers swimming in groups. It isolates victims with charm before poisoning and dragging them into the deep.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME mimics lone hikers with eerie accuracy. When confronted, it bursts into a cloud of violet powder and escapes into the air.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME are found in farmers' fields after a full moon. They delight in using their illusion powers to disguise themselves as crops and wait for people to come close. They then leap out to surprise their unfortunate target when they get too close.
Author: Katie

Entry: As they are elusive, attacks from wild POKENAME are rare but brutal. Victims report seeing all kinds of strange sights while they were pummeled over and over.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: POKENAME is the ultimate master of trickery. It channels its illusory magic through its spoons, enabling it to conjure realistic mirages.
Author: NellNast42

Entry: POKENAME takes on the form of hospital nurses and walks silently down the halls. While unnoticed, it feeds on the dreams of sleeping patients.
Author: .izik

Entry: This Pokémon will try to calm any organism that approaches them with its ribbons and put it to sleep with spores from its back.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: When threatened by Pidgey, POKENAME will use its cute charm to infatuate the predator.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Some believe this Pokémon is the descendent of a powerful bug-Pokémon, causing POKENAME to sell for a high price.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: After evolving, this Pokémon will shed its skin. The most expensive makeup is made with its paste.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The peculiar structure of its ribbon-like wings, while seemingly impractical for flight, lets POKENAME glide freely on wayward fairy winds.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Whenever a parade is around, POKENAME can be found on its floats. For as long as the event lasts, they will be dancing.
Author: rosemagwin

Entry: The intricately patterned wings are POKENAME's most distinct feature, with their bright pattern attracting unsuspecting Pokémon.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The legs of this Pokémon are blue only due to a certain toxin. The poison in the legs are extremely volatile, and can even paralyze an Ursaring.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: It's an experimental companion intended to help Trainers with depression. Its angular body is actually quite soft, and it's very popular with women.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: This Pokémon uses all its energy in the process of metamorphosis. It defends by warding off any Pokémon with a quick whip of it's ribbons.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: A Pokèmon that is still working on its ideal body. Please wait patiently until it's ready to come out of its shell.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: Regal and cute, POKENAME is a Fairy Trainer's best friend. It uses its ribbons to create a soothing smell, which makes its opponents lose their eagerness to fight.
Author: aberry8286

Entry: If you encounter one of these Pokémon, stay calm. Wild POKENAME detect fear, and will attempt to calm you down by injecting you with poison.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The strong, confident ruler of a hive. Its stinger injects a large amount of anti-androgens, reducing the aggression of attackers.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: With its radiating tranquility, it resolves conflicts with awe-inspiring psychic prowess. It can befriend any type of Pokémon.
Author: rigelpogi08

Entry: POKENAME is a cheerful and affectionate Pokémon known for its brilliant aroma and for appearing in the wild as soon as the first flower blooms in the spring. It is thought to migrate far away in winter, but none have seen this firsthand.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: The bright colors of this Pokémon leads many researchers to wonder it's advantage. Many believe that brighter POKENAME are considered better mates.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: POKENAME is a very unloved Pokémon. Due to this, it uses its sticky ribbons to catch humans in an effort to force them to love it.
Author: Crustyglowstick

Entry: Most POKENAME have 5 tails ribbons, but some have 6 or 7. The more tail ribbons that a POKENAME has, the more likely it is to find a mate.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: While some Pokémon may look for mates, POKENAME are indifferent. Considered stoic, owners of this Pokémon are viewed as wise and accepting.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: POKENAME loves to comfort both humans and Pokémon. Its ribbonlike tail provides a soft embrace while the stone on its head sends out soothing signals.
Author: alliveir

Entry: Unlike other Rattata, POKENAME are quite well-mannered and are commonly kept as regular pets. However, because they are so commonly domesticated, they struggle to survive out in the wild.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: When placed in the same biome as a Rattata, its quickly picked on. But when put in a snowy biome its fur keeps it warm and its color camouflages it.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Wild POKENAME are extremely skittish, but they're very friendly to their Trainer. It is said that if one approaches you, you are a truly kind soul.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Without a seed on its back, many wonder where the poison comes from. One theory says it comes from the ribbons; another says it comes from the fur.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The bud on its back is tied in a neat bow. It is said that if it lies in the sun, the bow will grow and untie into two more ribbons.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: POKENAME's cute, fairy-like head attracts unaware Pokémon. It then uses its razor-sharp pincers to threaten them into giving over their food.
Author: qwertyelephant

Entry: The juice POKENAME makes is so sweet that it's almost inedible. People say that the only ingredient of POKENAME's juice is love.
Author: birchbot

Entry: As a sign of affection for their Trainers, they will frequently make them gifts to show how much they love them.
Author: pankiwi

Entry: With upgraded emotional range and built-in projector screen, POKENAME is the perfect fusion of laptop and friend. It's the latest pride of Silph Co.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: POKENAME loves joining parades. Its happiness and positivity is highly contagious.
Author: rosemagwin

Entry: A pioneer of its own kind of magic, POKENAME uses magical incantations to annihilate foes with pure magical power.
Author: Marvin the Marrow Muncher

Entry: POKENAME are used to help with swimming lessons and those scared of the ocean. Its ribbon-like feelers helps soothe nerves while it gently carries them along the shallow waters.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME have been known to amplify and convert the joy and love they receive from their Trainers into magical power. The greater the bond they share, the stronger POKENAME will become.
Author: MileySakiko

Entry: It floats around quietly, drifting towards those angry or in distress, soothing them with a touch from its ribbon-like wings. It's thought that POKENAME actually feeds on the negative emotions it siphons from others.
Author: sk372

Entry: A conglomerate spirit made of willing, kind individuals. Those souls lost themselves in service to creating something to help future generations.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: This Pokémon lives by lakes and rivers where other Pokémon go to drink. They keep the peace and stop any Pokémon from fighting.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: POKENAME has become known for its habit of bathing in the sun.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Its pastel colors belie a cunning battler. Its ribbonlike feelers are soothing to touch, though it may be picky about who it allows to hold them.
Author: wigglypon

Entry: The ribbon-like wrappings that encase the body of POKENAME exude a calming aura. This aura allows it to soothe those it cares for and to lull those it feels hostile towards into a state where it can easily pull them into its void-like body.
Author: pjporwoll

Entry: POKENAME performs complex movements that resemble dancing to distract opponents before attacking. Trainers who underestimate it often find their teams overwhelmed.
Author: gtrwya

Entry: POKENAME are natural entertainers. Using magnetism, they detach and manipulate various parts of their body to put on dazzling displays.
Author: theartemis1

Entry: POKENAME sends a soothing aura from its ribbons to calm fights. It only finishes off truly evil opponents with its blade.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: POKENAME sends a soothing aura from its ribbons to calm fights. It only finishes off truly evil opponents with its blade.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: POKENAME sends a soothing aura from its ribbons to calm fights. It only finishes off truly evil opponents with its blade.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: POKENAME uses the ribbons that make up their bodies as snares, wrapping and enveloping their opponent to disable them. Once a foe is trapped, POKENAME patiently waits until their foe simply gives up.
Author: Katie

Entry: When confronted by a powerful foe, its wing-like tail flutters, exuding a peaceful aura that leaves its opponents in a majestic trance.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: A prototype of POKENAME that was designed to collect Fairy-type energy. However, the Moon Drive was faulty, so it was scrapped.
Author: T.I.A.

Entry: POKENAME's bolt-shaped feelers crackle with playful electric energy, sparking harmlessly as it glides around. It enjoys sneaking into electronics, using its charm to cause cheerful and playful chaos. It enjoys bringing smiles to faces.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: It has a habit of pulling its Trainer into a pocket of its surrounding fluid when at rest. This feels warm and comfy, not posing any risk of injury.
Author: wyattwintersoul

Entry: It extends its feelers to snag prey at range. This causes a numbness to wash over the ensnared victim; it does not struggle as POKENAME consumes it.
Author: wigglypon

Entry: Its hollow head is full of colourful gumball candies. It loves sharing them with others, but be warned: some of these treats are incredibly spicy!
Author: wigglypon

Entry: With its sleek, chic design, this Pocket Monster can protect your Key Items and emotional well-being all from inside a pocket or purse.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: POKENAME is known as one of the most elegant Pokémon out there. It rapidly strikes targets with its ribbons.
Author: themicelegion

Entry: POKENAME is widely regarded as a sign of good times and peace, due to their migration pattern that leads it across all regions in the world. Their valuable scales are typically found by those in bad situations, allowing them a chance at better lives.
Author: backgroundnoisegalore

Entry: This fusion gains an incredible amount of psychic strength. It also develops a worrying megalomaniac instinct to impose peace and love across the galaxy, annihilating anyone who resists.
Author: epping_forest

Entry: Its dams are the height of Pokémon comfort; few nests can compare to their intricacy. This has made POKENAME a popular partner for interior designers.
Author: wigglypon

Entry: POKENAME loves to soothe its Trainer by using its ribbonlike feelers. It is known to alert its Trainer of any danger by glowing brightly.
Author: bunkachunka

Entry: When Trainers see this Pokémon's floppy ears in the wild, they cannot help but pet it.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Like Drifloon, POKENAME still takes children. Its ribbonlike feelers calm down the children so that they won't scream or fight back.
Author: thisisnotaplaceholder

Entry: POKENAME will often gather with others of its kind to communicate and bond. They do this by tapping their small ribbons against their liquid bodies.
Author: zic

Entry: With its cytoplasm becoming more developed and sturdy, POKENAME are able to hug their Trainers affectionately without their bodies breaking apart.
Author: zic

Entry: Please exercise caution when hugging POKENAME. This little love bug's body temperature can exceed 20,000 degrees when it feels joy or affection.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: It lures Pokémon in with its cute appearance before entangling them in its ribbons. This causes its victim to fall in love and serve POKENAME.
Author: Shiina Valkyria (W)

Entry: A terrifying sea Pokémon, its long tendrils draw prey into its razor-sharp maw. Bizarrely, POKENAME has become popular with women in recent years.
Author: Momoiro Akane

Entry: It is known to be a guardian of peace, sending out a tranquilizing aura. It is known to aggressively defend its territory if threatened.
Author: Lyman#7749

Entry: POKENAME can sense the emotions of those around it. It releases a calming wave of sound to settle negative emotions.
Author: nyoomymph

Entry: POKENAME produce a soft creamy meringue from the top of their heads, which is used by pastry chefs to top delicious treats. They are especially popular on certain holidays, as eating this meringue is said to prolong a healthy relationship.
Author: quackquackattack

Entry: POKENAME is almost always happy and will hug anyone it cares for with its ribbons. Despite how strong POKENAME's hugs are, the ribbons help dull the crushing pain.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: Being warm-hearted and energetic, POKENAME brings a sense of joyfulness to wherever it goes. Companies frequently use this Pokémon to raise the morale of their employees.
Author: TeatedTiten

Entry: A POKENAME can sense the emotions of any living being from body heat alone. When lit, the stick this Pokémon wields burns a soft pink flame at the tip, giving off a harmless, pleasant aroma with a scent that differs for each individual smelling it.
Author: merclipse

Entry: Often depicted in children's fairy tales, usually as a magical guardian of the pure and kind-hearted. A real POKENAME is quick to resolve conflicts using the aroma from its wand, calming most but knocking out those blinded by rage.
Author: merclipse

Entry: Often depicted in children's fairy tales, usually as a magical guardian of the pure and kind-hearted. A real POKENAME is quick to resolve conflicts using the aroma from its wand, calming most but knocking out those blinded by rage.
Author: merclipse

Entry: The fire on a POKENAME's tail emits no heat. If you cook a Berry with their fiery breath, the Berry acquires a cotton candy flavor.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Due to this Pokémon's bright colors and size, they rely on speed when hunting.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Wild POKENAME use their large ears to hear any prey miles away. When mating, larger ears are seen as more admirable.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: This Pokémon catches its prey with its ribbons and claws. When around an Eeveelution or Eevee, its demeanor becomes much more playful.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Its large ribbon wings don't give this Pokémon the ability to fly. Instead, it uses the move Fairy Wind to lift it above the clouds.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Like Mantine and Remoraid, POKENAME attracts Magikarp and Goldeen when swimming down rivers.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: Its ribbons act as tentacles, useful for swimming and hunting. When they aren't being used, they float freely.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: This Pokémon swims against the stream. It still attracts many Water-type Pokémon while swimming, but only the strongest swimmers can keep up.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The large stone it has for a tail acts as a tanning machine and a light source. When a POKENAME isn't sunbathing, it's resting beneath its shiny tail.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The three heads love each other as if they were siblings and wrap their feelers around each other's necks to show their affection. They love to dance, even though their coordination is not that great.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: It is very playful and energetic. It is often found practicing various tricks so that it can cheer up its Trainer when they are sad.
Author: kittyluv090

Entry: This incredible swimmer beats pros without a sweat and paces with the fastest Water types. Despite this, it has a demeanor similar to that of Lapras.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: At first glance, its ears may look misshapen, but they are actually very hydrodynamic.
Author: themadcactus

Entry: The mysteries of Jynx carry over into POKENAME. It kisses foes first before biting them.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: POKENAME's venomous horn doubles as a lightning rod. By flying into the center of thunderclouds, it can absorb their electricity, which strengthens its body.
Author: darkweavile428

Entry: POKENAME are vicious predators, swooping down to deliver a poisonous blow then retreating back into the sky until its prey succumbs. It's recommended to exercise extreme caution around them for this reason.
Author: bee4082

Entry: POKENAME lacks the ability to use echolocation, so it uses its wing-like ears to listen to the wind in order to get around. While helpful, this makes it hyper-sensitive to other sounds.
Author: Patch

Entry: The ground trembles when it charges, leaving intricate fissures resembling maps etched into the ground. These formations vanish within hours, intriguing researchers.
Author: jaminmcready

Entry: POKENAME can fire poison-tipped darts from every hole in its body. When agitated, it fires these darts faster than the naked eye can comprehend.
Author: Baneful Bunker

Entry: The tail on its back adds to the destructive force of its spin. As long as it's spinning, it can even destroy entire streets.
Author: Soup1900

Entry: As aggressive as it is strong, wild POKENAME will often form large territories that they jealously guard from rivals. Its sharp beak and talons are said to be hard enough to cut through diamond.
Author: TheUnholyHandGrenade

Entry: Though small in stature, POKENAME can cause spectacular damage when angered. Thankfully, given its natural habitat, only trees will suffer its wrath.
Author: char_latte3412

Entry: POKENAME uses its sharp senses to anticipate incoming attacks and counter them with swift and precise strikes. Any attack that does slip through its guard is met by a remarkably tough hide studded with poisonous spikes.
Author: Katie

Entry: POKENAME uses its sharp senses to anticipate incoming attacks and counter them with swift and precise strikes. Any attack that does slip through its guard is met by a remarkably tough hide studded with poisonous spikes.
Author: Katie

Entry: The potency of POKENAME's horn poison plays a key role in its mating rituals. Males compare poisons by exposure, and females select the one whose venom proves most potent.
Author: Slimmagma

Entry: It was once believed that POKENAME's blade was a tooth that mutated. In truth, the head that has formed around it is a result of drastic metamorphosis of its hilt.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: The skeleton of POKENAME is composed of a highly durable metal. They often rally up lesser Pokémon and command them to raid towns for food.
Author: VaporVenator

Entry: Its rock-hard hide helps protect it as it defends its burrows from threats. It is known to treat its Trainers as if they were its children.
Author: MelodyDeLune

Entry: POKENAME uses its tail as an immensely powerful piercing drill. It's said that the intense durability of the spikes on its head and its back is due to POKENAME's sheer battle spirit and pride.
Male POKENAME are easily wooed into joining other colonies by one colony singing in better harmony than their own. They act as bodyguards for female POKENAME and act as conductors for Nidopuff.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: They are incredibly aggressive for their size. They are known to go toe to toe with Pokémon four times their size and come out victorious.
Author: itsmebrewsky

Entry: Its skull is nearly too heavy for it. POKENAME often struggles to wield its power and weight, and can resort to dragging it along the ground.
Author: crumple_2

Entry: POKENAME was once the apex predator of the ancient world, devouring anything smaller than it. Only after the species went extinct due to natural disasters could any other lifeforms begin to thrive again.
Author: sk372

Entry: Wild POKENAME feature a selfish and disagreeable personality. In blizzards, it can disappear from the naked eye and reappear to suddenly ram foes with its poisonous body.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: Its tail is extremely strong. Should someone pull it out of the ground while it naps, it will swing its tail with enough force to break bones.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME has no empathy for anyone it deems lesser than itself and will beat them into submission until it is satisfied. It has enough strength to pulverize bones with a single punch.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: Despite its small size, POKENAME is incredibly dangerous. It will go into a blind rage to protect its Trainer, destroying the surrounding terrain until every threat is defeated.
Author: Celio_0230

Entry: POKENAME's claws are strong enough to topple a transmission tower. The poison it applies to its claws from its mane paralyzes its prey.
Author: Celio_0230

Entry: POKENAME's poison is concentrated entirely in its tail. In a fight, it will use the tail as a bludgeoning tool, sapping their foe's strength as it pummels them relentlessly.
Author: Celio_0230

Entry: The sharp, blood-red jewel on POKENAME's head often intimidates its enemies. However, most POKENAME refuse to use their prized horns as a weapon.
Author: char_latte3412

Entry: POKENAME and Nidoking have a strong rivalry, competing to see if brains or brawn is more effective at leading Nidoran families. Scientific observation thus far has yet to indicate which is the superior outcome.
Author: sk372

Entry: Containing both the physical power of Nidoking and the large intelligence of Alakazam, POKENAME is a force to be reckoned with. When it goes on a rampage, it uses its psychic power to destroy everything in its path.
Author: DarkWeavile428

Entry: It uses its abnormally large tail to propel itself through the water. It will look for large rocks so that it can eat the algae.
Author: .izik

Entry: POKENAME is the leader of packs of Dewgong fusions, and its command is absolute. Disobedient members will be banished from their pack by POKENAME.
Author: typhloquil

Entry: POKENAME is a nocturnal, highly territorial Pokémon. Despite its bulky stature, it can easily blend in with its surroundings during the night.
Author: 8xviktor

Entry: Despite a small appearance, POKENAME's powers can be overwhelming due to a lack of full control. POKENAME is said to appear in areas suffering from drought.
Author: moga6

Entry: POKENAME drifts silently in the depths of the ocean with a shell capable of supporting extreme pressure. The water around POKENAME is unnaturally calm, as its presence subtly influences the ocean's currents.
Author: moga6

Entry: POKENAME drifts silently in the depths of the ocean with a shell capable of supporting extreme pressure. The water around POKENAME is unnaturally calm, as its presence subtly influences the ocean's currents.
Author: moga6

Entry: POKENAME is said to bring rain wherever it flutters, using its wings to scatter water that revitalizes any soil. Despite its immense strength, POKENAME focuses on nurturing its environment rather than engaging in pointless battles.
Author: moga6

Entry: POKENAME has the power of an ocean deity said to control currents all over the world. However, this form limits its power to a small lake.
Author: entomoxie

Entry: POKENAME is called 'The Stormbringer' in legends. With its power over ice and water, it flaps its wings to create devastating storms and tsunamis.
Author: Thora Daughn

Entry: Storms rage around POKENAME constantly, high winds shifting in the directions it desires, giving it immense advantage in its domain.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: They live among large rocks off of isolated shorelines. Many sailors have been led astray by the bright light from a well-meaning POKENAME.
Author: currentlymuffin

Entry: POKENAME drifts through the sea, directing currents and growing coral reefs to help rebuild damaged ecosystems. If it catches humans threatening the environment, it twirls rapidly to create whirlpools, refusing to let them escape unpunished.
Author: WIldheartrazorfangs

Entry: An everlasting drizzle of rain occurs where it dozes off. This light shower escalates into a devastating storm when POKENAME is provoked.
Author: VaporVenator

Entry: POKENAME lives inside of the deepest treasures of the ocean, from trinkets to ships. It will grow or shrink to fit the size of its newest home.
Author: hampterbychoice

Entry: Often mistaken as part of the seafloor, this Pokémon hosts a whole reef atop itself, its denizens helping provide for this slow behemoth.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: POKENAME sequesters itself in the deepest depths of the ocean to rest. Its awakening is heralded by inky, pitch black rain.
Author: bacondlx

Entry: POKENAME live in the deep ocean and can only be discovered by the most determined of Trainers. Though rare, they have been seen above the waves and always are accompanied by powerful storms.
Author: Katie

Entry: In order to defeat Groudon, Kyogre fused itself with Celebi. That way, it gained the ability to travel back in time to fight its rival over and over.
Author: milchik

Entry: One spray from POKENAME's spout summons heavy rain for miles surrounding it. It feeds itself by controlling underwater currents to pull prey into its massive mouth.
Author: bacondlx

Entry: With a flap of its arms, it can summon hurricanes. With a whip of its tail, it can cause tidal waves. As a result of its terrible power, POKENAME prefers to dwell in the darkest depths of the ocean.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: The primal energy that fills POKENAME keeps its gears spinning. It is said it will only become still if all the oceans dry up.
Author: .realthree

Entry: Groudon and Kyogre quarreled for millennia. But after fusing together and forming POKENAME, their rivalry ended, and they now reign supreme.
Author: Spooky Scary Kunoichi

Entry: Historical accounts associate strange weather with sightings of POKENAME. Clashing hurricanes, volcanic lightning, and flooded deserts are attributed to its presence.
Author: kingd8

Entry: When Genesect are infused with the DNA of Kyogre, a POKENAME is made. It is the ultimate hunter and dominates air, land, and sea with immense power.
Author: Spooky Scary Kunoichi (spookyscaryoverlord)

Entry: POKENAME lives in submarine ridges. When used for propulsion, its tail produces large amounts of steam. It's often confused for an underwater volcano.
Author: chromaerym

Entry: POKENAME lives in submarine ridges. When used for propulsion, its tail produces large amounts of steam. It's often confused for an underwater volcano.
Author: chromaerym

Entry: The mysterious POKENAME has only been seen a handful of times throughout history. Mysterious blinking lights in the sea are sometimes attributed to this Pokémon.
Author: bee4082

Entry: POKENAME cannot control the rainclouds it creates. It always extinguishes its own flame and ends up becoming grumpy.
Author: ceoofspooks

Entry: POKENAME is very squishy and not at all intimidating, but if provoked, it can expel thousands of gallons of water from its body.
Author: Glacierwing

Entry: They wander in trenches looking for ore to eat. The bubbles that blow from the holes around its body come out with enough force to pierce through steel.
Author: Schwaus

Entry: POKENAME lives quite a wild life, not unlike a tsunami. It surfs from wave to wave; discovering treasure on the ocean floor as it flows.
Author: trakito

Entry: Don't be fooled by its grin. This Pokémon has been known to sink entire islands.
Author: .realthree

Entry: The gentle tune POKENAME hums resonates throughout the ocean. It wishes for everyone to hear its voice by drowning the world in the sea.
Author: Hexx_Vixtar

Entry: POKENAME hibernates in the deepest watering hole in the savannah and is rumored to suck those who disturb their slumber into its tomb. Only those who successfully defeat a POKENAME in combat are allowed to escape.
Author: quackquackattack

Entry: In ancient times, POKENAME was the protector of a city by the sea. When a cataclysmic battle between the Titans of Land and Sea threatened its safety, it hid the city and itself at the bottom of the ocean.
Author: strawberry_boicake

Entry: It is very protective of the sea. It even destroys oil rigs and fishing trawlers in its rampages in defense of the ocean.
Author: homelessrager

Entry: Legends say that POKENAME flies inside storm clouds, using its spoons to bring rainfall across the entire world.
Author: kittyluv090

Entry: POKENAME commands the tides with crushing strength, wielding its trident to summon whirlpools mid-battle. Ancient carvings depict it as a sea god feared by sailors and rival Pokémon alike.
Author: segmoph

Entry: Ancient murals depict POKENAME as the slumbering guardian of Pokelantis whose many arms could calm or rage the seas. Texts foretell its awakening when the stars align, triggering colossal floods to resurface the lost civilization.
Author: frl6160

Entry: POKENAME alternates between sleeping in water and on ice. No matter where it goes, its red markings still glow clearly.
Author: Glacierwing

Entry: This Pokémon is constantly in shock from the destruction of its coral reefs. It sometimes haunts the beaches to scare swimmers away.
Author: elevn.

Entry: It awakens between long periods of inactivity. Never seen in full, its only herald are massive whirlpools, bringing ships right into its endless maw.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: POKENAME is driven by its rage. The small volcano on its back erupts when it is confronted with danger.
Before being fused into POKENAME, this Pokémon had to release an uncomfortable odor to scare away bird Pokémon. Now, POKENAME is respected by every Pokémon in the forest due to its mighty appearance.
This Pokémon fights with fists of fury like no other, burning with volcanic desire for victory. It ignites its fists, and its punches have been compared to being struck by a falling meteor.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME buries itself in the sand in order to prepare its soft innards for evolution. Its shell is incredibly robust and impossible to break open due to Groudon's scales.

POKENAME's wings can carry an incredible amount of weight and are capable of contracting themselves in order to freely switch from flying into quickly tunneling through the earth. This makes POKENAME a dangerous predator beneath and above ground.
This Pokémon keeps itself warm and protected until it is able to evolve. Its outer shell reaches up to 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
It radiates intense heat from within the cocoon as it creates magma inside that helps induce its evolution. The molten liquid seeps through cracks as the process nears completion.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME builds their nest underground. If someone were to approach it, POKENAME would defend it by stinging or piercing the enemy with its cone-shaped hands after building up momentum in the sky.
POKENAME flaps its wings in order to show its dominance over other bird Pokémon. It can fly at incredible speeds through rough sandstorms due to the scales on its feathers.

POKENAME is a cautious Pokémon. It fears that it could be swarmed by other Rattata and steal its food due to its unique appearance that resembles Groudon's. It is a fierce fighter and will not let that happen.

POKENAME is a cautious Pokémon. It fears that it could be swarmed by other Rattata and steal its food due to its unique appearance that resembles Groudon's. It is a fierce fighter and will not let that happen.
POKENAME is feared by all Rattata and is seen as a violent Pokémon. It has razor-sharp fangs that grow at a steady rate. It can even chew through solid ground.
It is said that POKENAME can dig from one side of the world to the other in under an hour, going straight through the mantle and core.
Author: cyprexx

Entry: POKENAME is known for its sharp and sturdy beak that it uses to impale its prey. It can be found resting near volcanic ecosystems.
The pattern on POKENAME's belly is scorching hot and can be easiliy spotted in the dark. It slithers through the ground and lunges out of it to wrap around an opponent.
POKENAME immobilizes incoming threats by plugging its tail into the ground, charging the ground with electricity.

POKENAME is capable of running 3 million volts through it's veins, which is 30 times stronger than a Raichu's body can emit. Scientists believe this is due to Groudon's ability of maintaining immense power.
Author: @over9001

Entry: This Pokémon is very well mannered. When two Sandshrew are fighting nearby, it will step between them and make them stop by making them look into its unsettling eyes.
The spikes on POKENAME's back are as sharp as needles. When it curls up into a spiky ball, it rolls at its enemies, piercing into them as a result.
POKENAME make their homes in active volcanic craters. Their scythes are made of molten earth and are hot enough to easily cleave through lead.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME has a volcanic ecosystem on its back. Scientists found out that the lava flowing through its body is a mixture of rocks from Mt. Ember and magma.

POKENAME is an incredibly dangerous Pokémon. It dives through the ground with only its white horn sticking out. Once it reaches its foe, it jumps at them with its mouth wide open to bite them with its strong jaw, injecting them with poison.
According to legend, POKENAME is said to have cleaved the land into continents and islands, and will again as the ages pass.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: POKENAME is a Pokémon feared by many mountain climbers. It uses its tail to chuck huge boulders across the valley. Its jaw is so powerful that it is capable of biting through sturdy mountain rocks, creating its own tunnel systems.
A single punch from POKENAME can send seismic shockwaves circling the globe. When enraged, it fires out thunderbolts powerful enough to create large fissures in the ground.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: Magma flows through POKENAME's body that can burn hotter than the sun, if not for the crystalline layer covering its body that cools it. The aforementioned glaze is pure Never-Melt Ice, thus it withstands such temperatures without evaporating.
Author: Shikuren

Entry: It is said that the magma flowing through POKENAME's body would burn hotter than the sun if not for the ice on its body cooling it constantly. No one is quite sure how the ice never melts.
Author: Shikuren

Entry: POKENAME contains the power of magma and the earth itself. It uses this incredible power to bake food to perfection.
Author: _snakeywakey_

Entry: POKENAME is a very agile Pokémon that wears protective scales on each of its tails and its body. It leaves footprints in the ground that can be commonly found around volcanic regions.
This Pokémon sings a mysterious soothing melody with its deep voice. It generates a beat by making the ground vibrate.
POKENAME uses its heavy weight and grooved body to sink to the bottom of dunes. They feast on ore deposits found beneath the sands.
Author: Schwaus

Entry: POKENAME's tail is protected by Groudon's scales. The flame that used to be on its tail is now located beneath the scales, which makes it less likely to go out. It sometimes tips over on its back due to the weight of its tail.
A colossal titan charged with electricity, POKENAME roams the land with ground-shaking steps. It leaves behind a trail of crackling energy in its wake.
Author: anarchaz

Entry: POKENAME's hefty tentacles cause the ground to quake below it. It is said that these Pokémon cannot be moved be any sort of attack.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME uses the network of mycelium in the ground to tear the mantle apart as it pleases. Avoid angering this Pokémon.
Author: .realthree

Entry: POKENAME sings with a deep voice, shaping the land with each spoken melody. It forms mountain ranges through its reverberate song.
Author: Hexx_Vixtar

Entry: This Pokémon can be found crawling inside volcanic caves. Its claws allow it to excavate tunnels in order to find small bugs to feed on.
POKENAME controls the land with a flick of its wand, creating entire mountains ranges within the blink of an eye. It fires powerful beams from its wand hot enough to melt through bedrock.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME's tail is protected by Groudon's scales. The flame that used to be on its tail is now located beneath the scales, which makes it less likely to go out. It sometimes tips over on its back due to the weight of its tail.

POKENAME's steps leave tiny tremors in its wake, though it often looks confused and even is spooked by the shaking. Its constant headaches sometimes lead to accidental mini earthquakes, much to its own surprise.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: POKENAME's wings can hold up to 3 tons of weight. It is said that when it flies over a city, a powerful Trainer will be born.
When POKENAME stomps onto the battlefield, its great weight causes massive fissures which often swallow its opponents whole.
Author: hampterbychoice

Entry: POKENAME's wings can hold up to 3 tons of weight. It is said that when it flies over a city, a powerful Trainer will be born.
POKENAME's shell is very resilient and heatproof, which makes it able to swim through lava at high speeds. It emits hot steam when it feels threatened.

POKENAME's tail is made out of a fairly distinct flame. Even though POKENAME is not a Fire-type Pokémon, it is still capable of maintaining the flame on its tail. Researchers believe the boiling water inside its body is keeping it alive and healthy.

POKENAME's body is filled with boiling water. Once it is aggravated, it will spray its opponent with scorching hot liquid. The pigmented color of its skin is likely due to the steam stored in its body.
This rare variant of POKENAME is popular and highly sought after since it bears resemblance to a villain from a classic and beloved video game.
Author: kittyluv090

Entry: POKENAME is an artifact from ancient times. It's said if you collect seven special stones, POKENAME will come back to life and grant up to three wishes.
Author: ETheWriter

Entry: POKENAME spends most of its time watching over its rather troublesome children. The two often fight one another if left unmonitored.
Author: bitterchemicalhaze, vaporvenator

Entry: POKENAME endlessly orbits the planet, bouncing between satellites. Its single eye is said to be capable of seeing the edges of the universe.
Author: .realthree

Entry: If a POKENAME desperately needs to escape a predator, it can hurl itself through the atmosphere towards the planet. However, this is a one-way trip.
Author: .realthree

Entry: Stories say a single drop of the poison in POKENAME's stinger is enough to fell the mightiest of dragons. Though unsubstantiated, Dragon-type Pokémon are noticeably wary in its presence.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME is rarely seen, as it stays above the ozone layer. By staying above the atmosphere, its abilities of ice have powered up immensely.
Author: Unknown

Entry: This Pokémon lives so high up in the sky that its existence is practically just a myth. It contains the DNA of all the Mega Pokémon known.
Author: milchik

Entry: POKENAME dwells in the most sinister and desolate abysses. The few divers who have encountered it have never been seen again.
Author: astrael1

Entry: POKENAME despises dragon Pokémon. It has adapted the Dragon typing and moves from its foes' battles into itself to improve its chances against its sworn enemy.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: It parasitizes meteorites and meteor-like Pokémon, such as Minior or Solrock, and eats them from the inside, leaving only an empty shell that POKENAME uses for self-protection. Without its armor, this Pokémon's thin body is much more vulnerable.
Author: milchik

Entry: As an apex predator, POKENAME considers everything prey. POKENAME drags its catches into underwater volcanoes, where it then boils them alive.
Author: musicsheep.

Entry: Despite its small size, POKENAME are filled with potent draconic energy. Its bite is highly venomous to humans and Pokémon.
Author: theartemis1

Entry: POKENAME is capable of causing a mass extinction event by clogging the atmosphere with volcanic ash. Its plates are made of pure obsidian.
Author: samulock

Entry: POKENAME descends from the skies extremely rarely, appearing only when it senses a foe worthy enough to challenge its might. In combat, it wraps its fists in flames that are said to burn with the intensity of the sun.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME are known as one of the smartest and most intimidating Pokémon. It flies endlessly, and when it finds prey, smashes into them at full speed.
Author: planatical/The Yang Soldier

Entry: POKENAME can race across the entire world in the blink of an eye. It is said it descends from the heavens at mach speed if the world is in danger.
Author: Thora Daughn

Entry: These Pokémon are heralds of disaster, descending from the sky to warn both people and Pokémon of world-changing events. Their horns are said to hold the power to split the sky in two.
Author: flickeredflame

Entry: POKENAME is incredibly sad when it remembers that its tower is in ruins. Sometimes its sadness is so great that it blows the wind harder.
Author: elevn.

Entry: POKENAME is a formidable fighter, known for its incredible strength and relentless spirit. With each powerful strike, it dominates the battlefield, leaving opponents trembling in its wake.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: POKENAME is capable of controlling sea winds. It can generate destructive storms capable of threatening the atmosphere.
Author: elevn.

Entry: POKENAME has only been seen dormant. However when awake has displayed immense power. The laser beams it fires from its arm can rip through mountains.
Author: the_smirker

Entry: When POKENAME is hungry, it uses latent energy to propel itself to mountaintops. It loves to eat ore found at the peak of these mountains.
Author: Schwaus

Entry: The beating of POKENAME's wings is strong enough to induce violent sandstorms. However, it can also quell them at a moment's notice.
Author: Busilisk

Entry: POKENAME carries a superficial resemblance to the Pokémon colloquially known as the Weather Trio. The tallest often has to force the other two members to cooperate instead of quarrel.
Author: sk372

Entry: One day, a Geodude left to train for months to master the power of dragons. It returned later, its fists possessed by a spirit.
Author: elevn.

Entry: A trained Geodude managed to evolve. It is forced to bind the spirit that controls it in order to protect the lands from its wrath.
Author: elevn.

Entry: POKENAME has the unique ability to quite literally punch someone into next week.
Author: the.the.the.the.the.the

Entry: It is said that when POKENAME appears, it will use a type of time magic to assist those in need. Many stories tell of POKENAME hastening the evolution of Dragon-type Pokémon in particular.
Author: sk372

Entry: Legends say that POKENAME can circle the globe so fast that it will start to turn back time. It has almost never been seen fully; the only remnants of its presence are a trail of blue light as it flies by.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: When you approach POKENAME, you hear the sound of a cuckoo clock before it disappears. Some believe that it travels through time to escape.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME can change the time on the dial of its watch at will, allowing it to travel through time. There are speculations that it is immortal.
Author: Kurator Chorby

Entry: POKENAME is very rarely seen, as it races around at the speed of sound. Sometimes it moves so quickly it can traverse time.
Author: coooooooookiee

Entry: POKENAME can stop time, and is constantly using this power to look up for reflections and to tidy up its looks without anyone noticing. However, it becomes too shy and nervous to stop time during a battle.
Author: epping_forest

Entry: Those who have reported seeing POKENAME always describe it playing the same song. They also claim the song sounds nostalgically familiar.
Author: JokersWild

Entry: Its control over time has distorted and become unpredictable. Without warning, technology in its vicinity may end up being replaced with its past or future equivalent.
Author: sk372

Entry: POKENAME is a warrior that uses its time travelling abilities to search for a worthy opponent. It has yet to find a strong enough opponent.
Author: Patch_Bros

Entry: POKENAME moves with uncanny precision, reacting to events a split second before they occur. Scientists believe its body emits a frequency that subtly influences probability, making it appear as though it glimpses into the future.
Author: jaminmcready

Entry: POKENAME can control the entirety of space-time. Some believe it to be the true Creator Pokémon, whilst others call it a corruption of existence.
Author: Scigaming

Entry: It's believed by many to be the Almighty Sinnoh and controller of all spacetime. Its power is rivalled only by Arceus itself.
Author: Toxicrown

Entry: This fusion controls the movement of the continents in geological time. It uses a series of ropes to pull them across the globe slowly but surely.
Author: milchik

Entry: Channeling the essence of time and technology, it manipulates temporal forces and surges through circuits, leaving a wake of disruption and mystery.
Author: anarchaz

Entry: Throughout history, POKENAME have appeared accompanied by mysterious apothecaries. Its appearance differs across different tales, but all stories share a common theme of helping those in need.
Author: sk372

Entry: Legends say that POKENAME have lived since the birth of Dialga. Their metallic forms are a blessing to grant them immunity from the effects of time.
Author: sabrina_the_witch

Entry: POKENAME appears to slither in the air like a snake in water. Its moderate control over the concept of time allows it to remain in a constant state of falling, removing the consequence of being pulled down.
Author: Slimmagma

Entry: The force of its rampage can be felt across all of time. If POKENAME were to become too infuriated, the flow of time would be shattered.
Author: nexusthenexus

Entry: One of POKENAME's secondary heads looks into its victims' pasts to analyze their weaknesses, while the other looks into the future to predict their movements. Thanks to this knowledge, POKENAME's merciless hunts are always successful.
Author: lordjoostmeister

Entry: Using its claws, POKENAME can rip through the fabric of time to create wormholes to the past and future. Occasionally, POKENAME partake in an interdimensional game of Tag with Celebi.
Author: TeatedTiten

Entry: The dams that POKENAME builds freeze time in their vicinity, much to its angry confusion. Officers often use its raging roars to locate and deal with the anomalies it builds.
Author: scalding

Entry: It has complete control over the flow of time within a fifty mile radius of itself. Unfortunately, it lacks the willpower to use it effectively.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: It's very dangerous, and attacks anyone nearby once it's midnight. There are many theories for this sudden rampage, although nobody knows for sure.
Author: imagine1.

Entry: This Pokémon cares deeply for others, protecting endangered species. Those who treat it with care are said to live long lives.
Author: imagine1.

Entry: Eating POKENAME's mushrooms is said to bring visions of either the distant past or distant future. People who eat them are usually too overwhelmed to give a good description of their vision.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME can absorb temporal energy that lingers in ancient ruins, allowing it to relive moments from eras long gone. Historians often travel with it, as its presence can uncover long-buried secrets of the past.
Author: jaminmcready

Entry: POKENAME loves the cold and can live for thousands of years. If its environment gets too hot, it freezes itself in time to reappear in the past.
Author: 7Magic7Mike7

Entry: POKENAME's howl can control the flow of time. When they gather into packs, they can distort people's perceptions of time from up to a mile away.
Author: .realthree

Entry: Getting too close to POKENAME can cause it to release toxic spores. These spores can cause delirium, fear, personality shifts, and death.
Author: wbmznrxo

Entry: When POKENAME runs quickly, it sometimes vanishes into thin air, only to reappear later. This is because it actually jumps forward in time.
Author: Ayutac

Entry: Historians have found scriptures which speak of POKENAME as a minor time deity. Stories say it slows time in moments of crisis, so it can save humans in need.
Author: sk372

Entry: For the sake of a distant future, it races through time at high speeds. Some believe it is behind every major historical event, correcting humanity's path across the timeline.
Author: sk372

Entry: Legend says that time stops when it tucks itself into its shell. Its projectiles always reach their target in an instant, no matter the distance.
Author: hampterbychoice

Entry: A titan of legend, said to guard the time-stream from those who would disrupt it. A single blast from the water launched from its cannon is said to blast the target through the flow of time until they crash against the end of eternity.
Author: sk372

Entry: The galaxy in its pouch swirls around endlessly. Some think they are gateways to other universes.
Author: auroraeuphoria

Entry: POKENAME can spin its body to create gravitational rifts. It is said that the gem at its center is a window to the entire cosmos.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: Its abdomen is lined with mysterious grenade-like objects. Studies suggest that opponents impacted by the detonation of these objects are transported to another dimension.
Author: Busilisk

Entry: Blessings from POKENAME, observed in the form of impossibly precise and smooth distortions of space, are described by witnesses to feel like a cold but soft hug.
Author: scalding

Entry: A noble fighter that forged its armaments deep within the core of a dying star. When it fights, a dizzying swirl of cosmic energy flows around it.
Author: seaslux

Entry: A driven fighter that draws cosmic energy within itself. When enraged, it lets loose terrifying aura blasts that hit with the force of supernovae.
Author: seaslux

Entry: A creepy Pokémon that has a strange sense of the world around it. Nobody knows what its intentions are.
Author: TheHeroicT

Entry: A playful Pokémon that has a strange sense of the world around it. Nobody knows what its intentions are.
Author: TheHeroicT

Entry: A creepy Pokémon that has a strange sense of the world around it. Nobody knows what its intentions are.
Author: TheHeroicT

Entry: This Pokémon absorbs everything that enters its orbit. It is said that its soul is that of a primal Pokémon connected to space.
Author: capry.700

Entry: Its horns have become potent enough to tear apart space itself as they snap shut. Whatever goes inside vanishes, as if it had never existed at all.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: A whole universe exists inside POKENAME's belly. Many believe that our universe could be inside a beast just like it.
Author: JokersWild

Entry: Its blade is formed from a shard of space-time. POKENAME can cut open rifts to distant parts of the universe or other dimensions.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: Its blade is formed from a shard of space-time. POKENAME can cut open rifts to distant parts of the universe or other dimensions.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: Its blade is formed from a shard of space-time. POKENAME can cut open rifts to distant parts of the universe or other dimensions.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: Some legends say Arceus cut the fabric of space into the perfect shape with these very blades. The edges of POKENAME are able to cut small rifts in reality, lending some credence to these tales.
Author: octolinggrimm

Entry: Legends describe this Pokémon as a messenger of the cosmos, travelling between distant galaxies at near lightspeed. The patterns on its wings are theorized to show images of an ancient universe.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME generate immense power within their bodies by manipulating space to create an engine that functions like perpetual motion. This allows them to produce incredibly devastating bolts of electrical power.
Author: Katie

Entry: POKENAME generate immense power within their bodies by manipulating space to create an engine that functions like perpetual motion. This allows them to produce incredibly devastating bolts of electrical power.
Author: Katie

Entry: Its fluff is said to contain whole galaxies. When it sheds, untold amounts of life are born and entropy itself recedes.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: POKENAME is said to contain a whole other universe inside its body. Scientists have theorized that if its lid is ever fully opened, its universe will violently collide with our own.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: A cosmic warrior without compare, capable of taking a million forms. Its DNA is ever-changing and adapting, capable of withstanding anything.
Author: koishikomeiji.

Entry: Someone once wished for the strongest Pokémon to a Jirachi, so it turned into POKENAME. It's so powerful that it can easily create black holes.
Author: Yorui3913

Entry: Someone once wished for the strongest Pokémon to a Jirachi, so it turned into POKENAME. It's so powerful that it can easily create black holes.
Author: Yorui3913

Entry: POKENAME uses its control over the boundaries of space to project its singing across dimensions. When it inflates itself, POKENAME can make the sound of its voice travel even farther.
Author: darkweavile428

Entry: POKENAME creates whirlwinds with its rapid movements. Its swirling vortexes ensnare prey, leaving them trapped within its cosmic grasp.
Author: anarchaz

Entry: When an aurora can be seen from anywhere in the world, POKENAME is the cause. It appears to have an array of primal powers, but due to its elusive nature, the extent of them has not been well documented.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: Arrows released by this Pokémon leave behind them trails of stardust that sometimes burst into flame, creating short-lived constellations.
Author: backgroundnoisegalore

Entry: POKENAME evolved after being further corrupted by excessive combat. The distorted energy bursting out of its chest is caused by battle damage.
Author: thybrodiebyronbrown

Entry: POKENAME is described as cunning and manipulative. It dreams about taking over the world. POKENAME has an unexplainable grudge against Jigglypuff.
Author: planatical

Entry: Some say POKENAME stand guard over portals to a distorted world. Normally amiable, those who attempt forceful entry will meet with its spectral shadow, which it pulls out from within the portal and controls with psychic strings.
Author: sk372

Entry: Known by the nickname of "Demon Serpent": If you are in POKENAME's line of sight, your chances of survival are zero.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME can channel red lightning through its spikes and cloak parts of its body in a shadow form resembling a midnight storm. It is mainly seen using these powers to give itself dramatic lighting as it poses atop empty cliffsides.
Author: scalding

Entry: POKENAME are some of the most violent Pokémon the world has ever seen. These Pokémon regularly attack villages, and sometimes even attack each other.
Author: the_smirker

Entry: This malevolent fusion flies around its home, the Distortion World. If disturbed, POKENAME will strike its prey down with powers of ice and shadow.
Author: Thora Daughn

Entry: POKENAME is said to have forged a psychic link with the Distortion World, enabling it to use the dimension's twisted shadows in gruesome combat.
Author: NellNast42

Entry: Legends state that POKENAME lives alongside Giratina in the Distortion Realm. Its wings are made of pure psychic energy.
Author: kingnekogamingyt_ttv

Entry: POKENAME seems to be native to the Distortion World. The more of them you see scattering amongst the floating rubble, the closer you are to Giratina.
Author: captainmodeus

Entry: Known as "The Demon Lord of Frogs", this Pokémon bashes anything that might be a threat with its mace. Despite its evil demeanor, some find it cute.
Author: themicelegion

Entry: Legend says that within the deepest and darkest caves in the ocean, POKENAME lurks, waiting patiently for its prey.
Author: kittyluv090

Entry: POKENAME guards the border between the living world and the void. Its howls echo with an unsettling sadness.
Author: Xoriey

Entry: POKENAME is a Tyrogue possessed by Giratina. Distorted energy bursts out of the Pokémon, unable to be contained.
Author: thybrodiebyronbrown

Entry: Born from a cursed game, POKENAME now haunts our world. It speeds around tall grass, hunting down fox Pokémon and their Trainers.
Author: ETheWriter

Entry: Inside this Pokémon's huge mouth is a portal to another twisted dimension. Everything that gets swallowed by POKENAME vanishes for an unknown amount of time, with few ever returning.
Author: milchik

Entry: Made from the void of space, POKENAME is said to have created the world thousands of years ago. However, it now inhabits a separate dimension.
Author: Spooky Scary Kunoichi

Entry: It is playful, graceful, spiteful, and brutal in equal measure. Witnesses have described POKENAME's fighting style as both unreal and captivating in its physical impossibility.
Author: Frink202

Entry: POKENAME feeds on the chaos and unrest of other Pokémon. It often appears in densely-populated areas and scares the denizens there, causing enormous stampedes.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: A savage hunter hailing from a different dimension. It creates tricky illusions by distorting the very fabric of this reality.
Author: NellNast42

Entry: If it sees someone going through a difficult time, POKENAME will invite that person to the Distortion World to relax and feel better. Sometimes they play games using the irregular gravity of this strange dimension.
Author: epping_forest

Entry: A terror blessed with unfathomable power. Were it to lose its temper, it could annihilate an entire continent in moments.
Author: PepperThePirate

Entry: Its cannon is filled with a strange power. The blasts from the cannon leave behind a strange field where both space and time are distorted.
Author: Soup1900

Entry: POKENAME possesses immense malice and is capable of attacking with overwhelming force thanks to the powerful cannon on its back.
Author: Spooky Scary Kunoichi

Entry: Its cannon is filled with a strange power. The blasts from the cannon leave behind a strange field where both space and time are distorted.
Author: Soup1900

Entry: When POKENAME skips over smooth water, it transforms it into a dark mirror that shows the Reverse World.
Author: .realthree

Entry: What was once the broken armor of a Golurk now houses the soul of Giratina. It uses its sharp tendrils to stab into prey before finishing them off.
Author: Sand_Coffin

Entry: When this Pokémon makes its way through to our world, it flares its abyssal wings and contaminates all light with its ghostly scales, distorting color from its surroundings until the only normal sight left are its red eyes.
Author: backgroundnoisegalore

Entry: The only known reference to this incredibly rare Pokémon is from an ancient proverb: “Beware POKENAME, servant of tyrants and destroyer of kingdoms".
Author: MidnightUmbreon💙

Entry: It appears in desolate locations to those who have lost all hope and inspires them to begin new lives. Its eerie aura makes remembering it impossible.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: POKENAME play tricks to startle others so they can consume the resulting fear. They were banished after taking their tricks too far, but some have snuck back into this world.
Author: .realthree

Entry: POKENAME's eerie appearance causes even the fiercest of Pokémon to cower in fear. It slowly ascends from the ground when entering our world.
Author: giggity._.

Entry: POKENAME is believed to have been formed from brimstone of volcanic origin. It is dedicated to a mysterious and enigmatic master.
Author: the_smirker

Entry: A pale imitation of the Distortion Realm. Those who wander near at night will disappear, never to be seen again...
Author: Rkmaster25367

Entry: POKENAME is a beast hailing from the Distortion World. Chunks of that dimension's earth are embedded into its body, and pose a threat to our reality.
Author: NellNast42

Entry: Legends claim that POKENAME's impenetrable shell contains a portal directly to the underworld. The unlucky few who have had a close encounter with this Pokémon reportedly felt extreme heat and heard whispers of lost loved ones.
Author: mbo1064.

Entry: After pummeling its foe senseless with heavy-hitting punches, POKENAME pulls its enemy into the portal in its belly.
Author: .realthree

Entry: POKENAME drifts silently between dimensions, its wires pulsing with static and sorrow. It feeds on corrupted signals and forgotten data, warping nearby machinery and unraveling the minds of Pokémon exposed to its presence for too long.
Author: jaminmcready

Entry: POKENAME struggles to walk normally. If it needs to, it can propel itself in any direction at the speed of a jet plane with a blast from its forelegs.
Author: ohok3441

Entry: The globe POKENAME carries is a hologram produced by its psychic abilities. It represents the world 900 years in the future. The only way this globe will disappear is if the world has ended.
Author: animecreep4

Entry: A POKENAME is born every time a new volcanic island surfaces from the ocean. The shrub on its back gets larger and healthier as the island grows.
Author: ziggaway

Entry: POKENAME is a small but powerful Pokémon, creating anything it pleases from folds of reality. It tends to abandon its own creations.
Author: OhOk3441

Entry: Carvings found in ancient ruins appear to depict POKENAME using its mighty tusks to hold back walls of ice. Archaeologists believe it may be responsible for areas that remained untouched by glaciers during the last ice age.
Author: lordjoostmeister

Entry: Its outer shell is metallic, while its body is magnetic. Due to its enormous size and magnetic body, POKENAME often clings to large metal objects.
Author: Sand_Coffin

Entry: Though it lives its whole life on the ground, POKENAME is thought to come from the sky. These Pokémon can be found scattered throughout the world.
Author: .realthree

Entry: Legends say that this Pokémon protected the world against tsunamis and hurricanes during ancient times. It died while trying to stop a giant asteroid.
Author: Soup1900

Entry: POKENAME must not move under any circumstance. The last time it took a step, two new regions were formed from the chaos.
Author: paisleylxl

Entry: According to myth, POKENAME is able to shatter landmasses with a strike. These myths claim that archipelagos result from the pieces.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: According to myth, POKENAME is able to shatter landmasses with a strike. These myths claim that archipelagos result from the pieces.
Author: abstrusePaladin

Entry: If the legends about Groudon and Regigigas are true, then POKENAME could entirely reshape the face of the planet. It is seemingly able to control the elements, from shards of ice to beams of steel.
Author: bobosmith01

Entry: Legends say that POKENAME's webs hold island groups together. It is a creative Pokémon, making dynamic structures out of their webbing.
Author: Mistymagius

Entry: POKENAME's thunderous footsteps and razor-sharp fangs make it a force to be reckoned with, feared by all who encounter its towering presence.
Author: anarchaz

Entry: POKENAME resembles markings found in ruins. People have tried to decipher these markings, but only found gibbberish.
Author: pokebio

Entry: As a parasitic fusion, POKENAME exhibits erratic movement. The two Pokémon that this fusion is composed of seem to be at equal control despite its look.
Author: mitcharlotte

Entry: Having won the battle for control, this parasitic Pokémon molts into an egg-like cap. Once it has grown enough, the cap will tear itself apart, bursting with what scientists call 'Regispores'.
Author: mitcharlotte

Entry: While POKENAME lies dormant, it pulses with near-infinite rage and strength. Mythological researchers say that should it awaken and unleash its power, a single punch could shatter the planet.
Author: sk372

Entry: Legends say that during the creation period of the Legendary Titans, the giant POKENAME would alter the deep sea floors of the world. Using its excavator-like claw to terraform the land beneath it.
Author: Clanker

Entry: It is said that anyone knocked out by one of POKENAME's devastating punches will be plagued with horrible nightmares.
Author: theartemis1

Entry: It is said that anyone knocked out by one of POKENAME's devastating punches will be plagued with horrible nightmares.
Author: theartemis1

Entry: It torments those that pollute its waters with nightmares of flash floods and towering tsunamis. Victims often wake up critically dehydrated.
Author: VaporVenator

Entry: On a moonless night, POKENAME can be found lurking near villages. It is known for making people experience nightmares in which they are engulfed in flames.
Author: @over9001

Entry: At night, POKENAME grows stronger the less visible the moon is. To reach its full power, it blankets the sky in dark thunderclouds, smothering the land in shadow and lightning.
Author: h0bojoe

Entry: POKENAME fly over oceans on dark nights, looking for Dragonite guarding lighthouses. These brawls have been known to last for days, sometimes weeks.
Author: gerakobitz

Entry: POKENAME spreads a sleep-inducing smoke when it flaps it wings. This smoke also calms young Darkdle by blocking their alarm pheromones.
Author: hampterbychoice

Entry: It manifests near the weak-minded, planting seeds in their mind that give life to chilling nightmares. People never see it again once they awaken.
Author: alliveir

Entry: POKENAME swarm together late at night, darkening the sky as they fly overhead. They are drawn to negative emotion and subconscious fears and will flock toward those suffering from nightmares.
Author: Katie

Entry: POKENAME swarm together late at night, darkening the sky as they fly overhead. They are drawn to negative emotion and subconscious fears and will flock toward those suffering from nightmares.
Author: Katie

Entry: POKENAME's piercing gaze can instantly put any human or Pokémon into a deep sleep. It plucks at the dreams of those who fell victim to its gaze.
Author: TheKRT

Entry: On new moons, they're known for collecting people's pleasant dreams and turning them into bad ones.
Author: pankiwi

Entry: It takes people's dreams and stores them as Dream Mail in its tail. When it gets hungry it will open an envelope and consume the dream inside.
Author: bacondlx

Entry: POKENAME is fiercely protective of its kin, carrying things like Toxic Orbs in their pouch to trick other Pokémon looking to steal its eggs.
Author: clickonflareblitz

Entry: Its "tears" are heavily sought after, as it is used to make sleep medicine. However, some consumers have reported experiencing frightening nightmares.
Author: alliveir

Entry: POKENAME scurries around forests, guarding its territory from intruders. If found, it can put others to sleep for a short time as it runs away.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: It hides in dark forests, blending into the surroundings. POKENAME hunts by putting others into a deep sleep as they get lost in the forest.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: It can lull people and other Pokémon to sleep. As they dream, it wraps vines around the sleeping target, draining them of their energy.
Author: ThePandaSharky

Entry: POKENAME lurks among groups of wild Torchic on moonless nights. Those who ignore its need for a warm hug are cursed with nightmares for a week.
Author: h0bojoe
